title: Quarkus 3.0.0.CR2 released
content: Today, we released Quarkus 3.0.0.CR2, our last step before building the 3.0.0.Final bits. Please try it with your applications, the update is easy in a lot of cases, and report any problem to us by creating a GitHub issue. To upgrade your application to Quarkus 3.0, see the instructions below....
